meta.video_title: How AI Is Changing Newsrooms — a short breakdown

x.text: New video: How AI Is Changing Newsrooms — practical workflows for reporters. Watch: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lAIERNZphMc

linkedin.text:
We just uploaded a short breakdown on how AI is changing newsrooms — practical workflows, caveats, and quick wins reporters can use today. Full video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lAIERNZphMc

If you work in newsrooms, I’d love to hear which AI workflows you’d try first.
